backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profile management, conversation session storage, and access-controlled CRUD operations for an ICP backend. Includes session filtering by owner/admin, pattern/bias/ethics tracking, and authorization via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the 'Fix New Session button' feature to Dashboard.tsx and listing associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app, mounting the React root at #root and loading the main.tsx module entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up routing, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and handles auth flow including role assignment, profile setup modal, and language selection before rendering the router.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky application header displaying the Olya logo, ASR/NLP/ethics status badges, a theme settings popover (Palette icon), language selector, user manual link, and login button.
frontend/src/components/AppLanguageSelec: Language selector component supporting 41 languages, available in both a full-screen onboarding variant and a compact popover variant, backed by the useAppLanguagePreference hook.
frontend/src/components/BeliefStatePanel: Renders a canvas-based visualization of belief state including trust level, speaker orbit nodes, persuasion arc, and concerns overlay, plus a grid of summary stats below.
frontend/src/components/EmotionIntentPan: Displays emotion and intent confidence bars for the latest transcript entry, along with a scrollable list of recent entries with speaker badges.
frontend/src/components/EthicsBadge.tsx: Shows an expandable ethics status badge (Safe, Bias, Toxic, or violation type) with icons, severity, bias categories, and flag details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: A searchable popover dropdown for selecting a transcript language, supporting auto-detect mode with display of the latest detected language.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A login/logout button that uses Internet Identity authentication, handling loading states and re-authentication edge cases.
frontend/src/components/PanelContainer.t: A reusable styled panel wrapper with a header (title, icon, status dot, optional right slot) and support for active glow variants.
frontend/src/components/PatternPredictio: Displays predicted next emotion, next intent, conversation direction, and risk level derived from transcript entries using a pattern prediction engine.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that prompts new users to enter an operator name to initialize their profile, calling an async `onSave` callback on form submission.
frontend/src/components/SafetyQualityPan: Displays computed safety metrics (bias incidents, flag rate, ethical violations, trust score) derived from transcript entries, with color-coded values and status badges.
frontend/src/components/SemanticAnalysis: Renders aggregated semantic analysis of transcript entries including emotion and intent distributions with color-coded badges, plus toxicity flag types for the latest entry.
frontend/src/components/SessionManager.t: A sidebar panel that lists conversation sessions with preview text and timestamps, supporting session selection, creation, and deletion with loading states.
frontend/src/components/SessionSummaryBa: A compact summary bar showing key session metrics—health score, exchange count, dominant emotion, top strategy, and bias incidents—derived from transcript entries and belief state.
frontend/src/components/StrategyEnginePa: A panel that generates and displays RL-ranked negotiation strategy recommendations from transcript entries using a local simulator, with confidence score badges and backend persistence of the top strategy.
frontend/src/components/ThemeSettingsPan: A settings panel component that lets users toggle light/dark mode and select from four color themes (Ocean Teal, Midnight Slate, Ember Amber, Forest Green) using the ThemeContext.
A transcript input component with a textarea, speaker role selector, ASR engine selector (Web Speech, Whisper, DeepSpeech), and mic toggle that submits entries with detected language via speech recognition or manual text.
Displays a scrollable list of transcript entries with speaker badges, detected language indicators, toxicity flags, and per-entry translation toggle buttons.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: Provides a React context wrapping the useTheme hook, exposing theme state globally via ThemeProvider and useThemeContext.
frontend/src/data/languages.ts: Exports a comprehensive LANGUAGES array of language objects with ISO codes, English names, and native names covering hundreds of world languages and regional variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLanguagePrefere: A singleton-based hook that persists the app's UI language preference to localStorage and broadcasts changes to all mounted hook instances via a shared listener set.
frontend/src/hooks/useAsrEnginePreferenc: A hook that reads and persists the selected ASR engine preference ('webSpeech', 'whisper', or 'deepspeech') to localStorage with getter and setter utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardState.ts: Manages the core dashboard state including transcript entries and a belief state (trust/persuasion scores) that updates based on detected emotions, intents, and toxicity flags from NLP analysis utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguagePreference: Persists and retrieves a transcription language preference (defaulting to 'auto') in localStorage, exposing get/set/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend canister interactions including fetching/saving user profiles, managing conversation sessions, and ensuring user role assignment.
Wraps the browser Web Speech API and simulates Whisper/DeepSpeech ASR engines, providing start/stop controls, interim/final result callbacks, error handling, and processing status messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages UI theme name and light/dark mode, persisting selections to localStorage and applying them via CSS class and data attributes on the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Returns a translation function `t` that resolves UI string keys using the current app language preference with English fallback.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains a large static translation dictionary mapping UI string keys to translations across 41 supported languages, with a `getTranslation` helper that falls back to English.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for multiple themes (Ocean Teal, Midnight Slate, and others) including dark mode variants.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using `clsx` and `tailwind-merge`.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page component that manages sessions, transcript entries, and renders all analysis panels (emotion, belief state, strategy, etc.) with Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/UserManual.tsx: A printable user manual page with a table of contents, structured sections, and reusable components (Section, StepList, InfoBox) documenting all application features.
Simulates a belief graph by extracting positions and interests from transcript text and building nodes/edges representing speaker relationships, trust, and persuasion levels.
frontend/src/utils/emotionIntentSimulato: Analyzes transcript text using regex pattern matching to detect emotions (anger, joy, fear, etc.) and intents (negotiating, persuading, etc.), with optional translation to English before analysis.
frontend/src/utils/ethicalConstraints.ts: Defines regex-based ethical rules for detecting and redacting harmful text patterns (personal attacks, manipulative framing, dehumanizing language, coercive pressure) and exports an `enforceEthics` function that returns violation type and sanitized text.
frontend/src/utils/ethicsSimulator.ts: Provides pattern-based detection of toxicity, bias (gender, racial, socioeconomic, and general), and returns structured `EthicsResult` objects with severity, flags, and bias categories for analyzing text ethical quality.
frontend/src/utils/hallucinationGuard.ts: Detects potential AI hallucinations in text by matching patterns like unsourced statistics, vague authority claims, and fabricated specifics, returning a confidence score and list of suspect phrases including context contradiction checks.
frontend/src/utils/languageDetector.ts: Client-side language detection utility that uses Unicode range checks for non-Latin scripts (Cyrillic, Arabic, CJK, Devanagari) and keyword pattern matching for Latin-script languages, returning an ISO 639-1 language code.
frontend/src/utils/llamaRLEngine.ts: Implements a reinforcement-learning-inspired negotiation strategy recommender that scores and ranks strategy candidates based on trust level, persuasion score, dominant emotion, and intent derived from a conversation transcript window.
frontend/src/utils/nlpSimulator.ts: Client-side NLP simulator that performs topic detection, entity extraction, sentiment analysis, and keyword extraction on text using keyword matching and regex patterns, returning a structured SemanticAnalysis object.
frontend/src/utils/patternPredictionEngi: Analyzes transcript entry sequences to predict next emotion/intent, assess conversation direction (escalating/de-escalating/stable), generate action window recommendations, and estimate hallucination risk.
frontend/src/utils/strategySimulator.ts: Wraps the LLaMA+RL engine to generate negotiation strategy recommendations from either raw text/intents or a list of TranscriptEntry objects, with fallback strategies on error.
Client-side translation simulator using a static phrase dictionary to map common negotiation and conversation terms across multiple languages including Spanish, French, and others.
frontend/src/utils/trustworthinessScoreC: Calculates a 0–100 trustworthiness score by applying capped penalties for bias incidents, ethical violations, and hallucination flag rates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color palette (teal, amber, navy, charcoal, panel), typography, container queries, animation plugins, and extended theme tokens like box shadows and border radii.
project_state.json: Tracks project state version 7, summarizing multi-language support features, known issues (broken delete/new session buttons), existing fix features, and new feature requests (AR-1 through AR-5) for manual download, translations, and validation prompts in user-selected languages.
